markdownRemark.html:
Hello, I am Swapnil Shindemeshram. I am Technology Enthusiast with experience in Machine Learning, Web development, Mobile Development and Cloud Technology. I love to design and develop real world challenges into IT solutions. My dream is to create technology products which will be used by billions of people.

Technologies I have worked on:

Tensorflow, Reactjs, React Native, Django, Django Rest Framework, Kubernetes, Docker, TFX, Google Cloud Platform

Companies I have worked with:

YouBotics Software Pvt. ltd. (Realtime Technical Video Interviews With AI BOT)

I had started working in YouBotics as Machine Learning Engineer. Working in a startup, one has to take multiple responsibilties, as I previous had experience working with React and Django. I end up doing React, Django and Machine learning in YouBotics. After an year, I got a chance to lead the development team and work on cloud services like GCP and deployment management using Google Kubernetes Engine.

Things I have worked on in YouBotics:

  1. Worked with product manager to design and implement important product features.
  2. Worked on Natural Language Processing, created Deeplearning Models using Tensorflow and deployed using tensorflow serving and kubernetes.
  3. Models I have worked on includes documents parsing, recommendation engines, similarity and emotion recognition.
  4. Created UI applications using React and Redux. I was also responsible for training new joinees on React, Redux and Component Design in React.
  5. Wrote few complex pieces invloving image processing and audio processing
  6. Worked with docker and kubernetes.
  7. Created Continuous Integration Pipelines using Bitbucket and Google Cloud Platform
  8. Experienced in Google Cloud Platform on services like GKE, GCS, VM instances, Stack Driver, GCR.io.

Flying Penguins

It was my first Internship Experience I got in Flying Penguins. I learnt about web development, API development and databases. I was first introduced to AWS cloud and firebase at Flying Penguins.

Things I have worked on in Flying Penguins:

  1. Worked on insteresting projects liks Swapaholic
  2. Learnt Api development using Laravel PHP framework
  3. Worked on AWS Object Storage, SNS service and EC2
  4. Was also responsible for creating POCâ€™s for products.
